hero.headline: Build Modern Websites with Ease
hero.subcopy: Create stunning, high-performance landing pages in minutes. No coding required, just pure creativity.

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: Optimized for speed with minimal bundle size and instant page loads.

features.title: Secure by Default
features.description: Enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption and compliance.

features.title: Beautiful Design
features.description: Modern, responsive templates that look great on any device.

features.title: Analytics Built-in
features.description: Track performance and user engagement with detailed insights.

features.title: Global CDN
features.description: Deploy worldwide with automatic edge caching for instant access.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Work together seamlessly with real-time collaboration features.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: This platform transformed how we build and deploy our landing pages. What used to take days now takes minutes. Absolutely game-changing for our marketing team.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: The performance optimizations are incredible. Our page load times dropped by 60% after migrating. Our conversion rates have never been better.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.content: Finally, a tool that bridges the gap between design and development. Our campaigns launch faster, and the results speak for themselves.

testimonials.name: David Kim
testimonials.content: The template system is brilliant. We maintain brand consistency while still creating unique experiences for each product launch.

testimonials.name: Jessica Taylor
testimonials.content: A/B testing different landing pages has never been easier. We've increased our sign-up rate by 40% in just three months.

testimonials.name: Alex Thompson
testimonials.content: The developer experience is top-notch. Clean code, excellent documentation, and the support team is incredibly responsive.

pricing.name: Starter
pricing.description: Perfect for individuals and small projects

pricing.name: Pro
pricing.description: Best for growing businesses and teams

pricing.name: Enterprise
pricing.description: For large organizations with custom needs

faq.question: How long does it take to create a landing page?
faq.answer: With our platform, you can create a professional landing page in under 15 minutes. Simply choose a template, customize the content, and publish. No coding required.

faq.question: Can I use my own domain?
faq.answer: Yes! You can connect your custom domain to any landing page. We also provide free SSL certificates for all domains, ensuring your site is secure.

faq.question: Is there a free trial available?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer a 14-day free trial on all plans. No credit card required. You'll have access to all features so you can fully evaluate the platform.

faq.question: Can I export my landing pages?
faq.answer: Yes, you can export your landing pages as static HTML/CSS files at any time. You maintain full ownership and control of your content.

faq.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faq.answer: We offer email support for all plans, with priority support for Pro and Enterprise customers. Enterprise plans also include dedicated account managers and 24/7 phone support.
